title: Looking for a Silver/bronze ADC Main to Duo with
body:
Hey guys, I'm a Bronze 3 Support Main, i have a 79% winrate with blitzcrank and a 4.00:1 KDA
I'm looking for a bronze or silver ADC main to duo with, I honestly cant stand my trash teams and I really want someone to pair up with so I can enjoy WINNING ranked.

replies.body:
Hey terry,
Unsure if your still looking for a duo buddy but
I'm an ADC main in B1 currently, I'm sitting at a solid 60-70% win rate, and usually hard carry with my {{champion:119}} .
I would love a good blitz or some other hard cc support to duo with! 
I main {{champion:67}} >{{champion:119}} >{{champion:81}} >{{champion:18}} 
I'm a complete non-toxic person, I have discord only but will use if you want.
Not on often though, usually only on sundays, feel free to add me bro!
yea same bro i only play on weekends so thats perfect! ill add u ingame.. and plus i do have a discord with over 60 league players now that we all have fun and flex with https://discord.gg/ZAzkp8w

hey im b3 and im slowing vlimbing in solo q i would love to join u
and some of my win rates suck cos i was placed in gold and i just dropped to b5 brfore i got good im winning most of my games now
i play 
twitch
vayne
xayah
kalista
and some others if i have to couter pick e.g cait trist
absolutely would love to duo w u :) ill add u in game
I added you Terry im Silver 3 atm
